name: Beach Melon
description: A little to the left, a little more to the right, okay, there it is! If you want to run around with watermelon on the beach, be careful not to be knocked on your ass by the blindfolded man who wants to eat watermelon!

name: Beast Headwear [1]
description: Lifelike headdress made of Year that appears only in Spring Festival.

name: Beast Headwear [1] Blueprint
description: Lifelike headdress made of Year that appears only in Spring Festival.

name: Beast Heart
description: Wearing it seems to make you as sharp and strong as a beast.
effect: Agi ＋4,[Flamberge X] ＋ [Advanced Sack Teddy Shoes IV] ＋ [Undershirt VIII] ＋ [Beast Heart VIII]: ＋3% Atk, ＋3% Crit.Dmg, ＋5% Atk SPD, ＋10% Max HP

name: Beast Heart [1]
description: Wearing it seems to make you as sharp and strong as a beast.
effect: Agi ＋4,[Flamberge X] ＋ [Advanced Sack Teddy Shoes IV] ＋ [Undershirt VIII] ＋ [Beast Heart VIII]: ＋3% Atk, ＋3% Crit.Dmg, ＋5% Atk SPD, ＋10% Max HP

name: Beast Scale
description: The strange scales falling from Year Beast. It's said that five pieces can be used to to summon junior beast.

name: Beast Stomach
effect: Def ＋15,When Refining ＋10 and Luck reaches 90, Crit.Dmg ＋5%

name: Beast's Tail Blueprint
description: Parents will have their kids put on cute beast's tails to protect them at new year so that the beast will not feel the presence of kids when it comes.

name: Belief Token
description: Issued by the guild management center, it can be used to raise the blessing level of guild faith, and will be automatically consumed when the cost of faith exceeds 2000 Zeny.

name: Bell
description: A swaying and resounding bell. It is especially for children. Being a very rare item, it can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Bell plant
description: Do you want to hear the tree of Yggdrasil's heart beat? Equip it to immerse yourself into the sound of nature.

name: Bell Ribbon
description: The cute hair band has the small bell on the end. It seems that the bell will ring immediately.

name: Bell Ribbon [1]
description: The cute hair band has the small bell on the end. It seems that the bell will ring immediately.

name: Bell Ribbon [1] Blueprint
description: The cute hair band has the small bell on the end. It seems that the bell will ring immediately.

name: Bemstar Doll Hat
description: Bemstar is a small monster feeding on cometary dust, wearing it on head might absorb the essence of heaven and earth.

name: Bemstar Doll Hat [1]
description: Bemstar is a small monster feeding on cometary dust, wearing it on head might absorb the essence of heaven and earth.
